Bio

Hi! I am a 23 y/o Slovak guy, who likes to code. I am keen to learn new technologies. We gotta move forward, as fast as the IT world is.

Various restaurants & pubs

Barman

In my early years before college I worked in several restaurants as a part-timer. There I learned how to be patient and how to talk to customers.

Millennium, spol. s.r.o.

Support Operator

In April 2016 I started working as a support operator in Millennium. There I learned MS Dynamics, MSSQL and broaden my knowledge of C#. During this period I have created a game called Gopnik Simulator, which was the first game I have ever published.

Millennium, spol. s.r.o.

Support Developer

In March 2018 I wanted to extend my experience in the field and got promoted to Support Developer. That means that beside the support I actively participated on projects and helped the team on various projects, creating plugins for CRMs and developing custom CMS systems. During this period I also got interested in web app development. Thanks to my friend Felix from Germany I learned basics of React, React Native, Docker. This led to learning the whole MERN stack alongside with Redux, GraphQL, Webpack and other technologies.

Millennium, spol. s.r.o.

Full stack Developer

In July 2019 I became a full-stack developer for the Millennium. I started maintaining React apps in various projects. Currently I am creating an intern app for a international client.
